name: [City of God I:Prison Empire]-Warden's Music Box
detailed_description:
Warden's Music Box DLC gives the power of music to the prison.

More songs, more joy


Additional songs, which are limited to this DLC, will be added to the game.

New in-game item: LP player


New item for your office: LP player to listen to all the in-game soundtrack, plus additional songs which come with this DLC at the warden's office.

* Warden's office has to be upgraded and LP player has to be placed in the office to be able to listen to the songs.

Music buff


Music affects your warden's mood and productivity. When you play music on the LP player at the office, it gives some buffs to the warden such as working faster and feeling happy.

Reputation comes with music


Earn 1000 reputation after activating the item comes with the DLC.

* Item can be used once per game save and can be used for unlimited new games, no matter if it is story mode or empire mode.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Xp，Vista，7
  • Processor: 1.6 Ghz
  • Graphics: 128 MB 显存，能够运行 Shader Model 1.1
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win7,Win8,Win10
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 Ghz
  • Graphics: 256 MB 显存，能够运行 Shader Model 2.0+
